description: Rapide Surcharge d'Opérateur pour la Différentiation Automatique, a code generator to efficiently compute higher order derivatives via operator overloading. Rapsodia is intended for the computation of higher order derivative information of numerical models written in Fortran, C or C++ by automatic differentiation.
name: Rapsodia
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
